label: Travel Insurance
description: Insurance policies that provide coverage for unexpected events that may occur while traveling.
intents: Protect against financial loss due to trip cancellation or interruption

subcategories.label: Pre-Existing Medical Conditions
subcategories.description: Coverage for travelers with pre-existing medical conditions.

subcategories.label: Winter Sports
subcategories.description: Coverage for winter sports activities such as skiing and snowboarding.

subcategories.label: Over 65
subcategories.description: Coverage for travelers over the age of 65.
